query.mssql: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = N'{0}') BEGIN create table {0} ([Mark] nvarchar(max), [Id] int, [Hyperlink] nvarchar(max), [DocumentInfo] nvarchar(max), [ActionItemText] nvarchar(max), [PlanDate] nvarchar(max), [Status] nvarchar(max), [Supervisor] nvarchar(max), [NewPlanDate] nvarchar(max), [ReportSessionId] nvarchar(max)) END
query.postgres: create table if not exists {0} ([Mark] citext, [Id] int, [Hyperlink] citext, [DocumentInfo] citext, [ActionItemText] citext, [PlanDate] citext, [Status] citext, [Supervisor] citext, [NewPlanDate] citext, [ReportSessionId] citext)

query.default: select * from ActiomItems_Reports_AssistantCEO temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by Id
